page.title: 04Industry:Brimsdown 1
page.content: Brimsdown has always been popular with industry, largely due to the good{ {transport}facilities which have been a feature of the area. Many firms have been established here for a long time,first using the{River {Lee Navigation}to bring in{barge loads {of raw materials}and also to move{ {manufactured goods to the markets of {LONDON.} Later the{railway}provided a means of moving goods quickly and efficiently and the present day system of{motorways and arterial roads}which serve the area has continued this tradition. The range of goods being produced is extremely diverse and always has been.There are many new,smaller industrial sites which are used as{warehousing and distribution {centres}and several large retail trading outlets. { }
